profile:
Abell Pest Control is a family owned Canadian company dedicated to providing effective, professional and courteous service in pest management. Started in 1924 with one office, Abell now employs several hundred people with branch offices across Canada and the United States.

Guaranteed Pest Control in Canada

Control of mice, roaches, ants, wasps, animals and dozens of other pests
-Full money-back guarantee
-FREE no-obligation quote
-Effective, safe and fast pest elimination

Guaranteed Pest Control
Pests bring dirt, disease, and discomfort through their bites and droppings. Effective, safe and fast elimination of the pest is what you need now.

Fast & Safe Elimination
Controlling pests can be done safely and effectively by a trained professional. Effective pest control is a three-step process:

1)-Identification: Our pest control technician will review your property to find the nature and extent of the pest infestation. The most important element is locating the source of the infestation.
2)-Elimination: Once the pests have been identified and located, your technician will safely eliminate the infestation -- guaranteed*.
3)-Prevention: After the pest infestation is eliminated, your technician will provide you with a complete review of your property, making specific recommendations to help keep the pests away permanently.


Guaranteed Extermination
Your contractual pest is Gone and Guaranteed. If you are not satisfied with the services provided to you within the guarantee period, you will receive a Full Money Back Refund!

* All Abell Service Recommendations must be complied with and follow up services allowed for during the guarantee period to be eligible for any refund. Call for details.

profile:
SOS Extermination can offer thorough, reliable & affordable pest treatment services all through Montreal, QC, Canada. You can rely on our pest controllers to deliver a safe and highly effective pest management solutions for your house. Our team of licensed pest technicians give you a reliable & highly effective pest management for your home. Contact SOS Extermination today. Get in touch now & obtain a free, no-obligation quote. We appreciate you for your recent visit to our site. 

Inspection For Pests 

Our termite and timber pest inspection reports can provide you with such important details as pest and termite activity & damage to structural integrity noticed in internal and external areas. Get in touch with our specialists right now for a free consultation regarding how we could safeguard your property. 

Dealing with Ants 

There are actually several thousand ant species present in Montreal but luckily only some are regarded as pests. Ants can travel along way from their nest structures to get a source of food. Did you know, ants march food items right back to their colonies. This behavior is instinctive. Among the DIY solutions you can take to lessen ant infestations are immediately cleaning food spills, pruning trees & by routinely mowing your landscape. Eliminate your ant issue with our professional ant treatment services. 

Bedbug Control & Eradication 

SOS Extermination employ a combination of treatment strategies that eliminate these parasites no matter where they are hiding in your house. 

Cockroach Issues 

Our way of cockroach treatment consists of the effective use of roach gels and non-toxic insecticides. In case there are roaches in or around your home or business, call our pest management specialists. 

Why Us 

- Friendly service that makes clients happy and willing to come back.
- Effective & budget-friendly end of lease pest management.
- Integrated pest management solutions for residential buildings.
- Early detection of termite activity & termite control.
- Pest treatments and solutions at reasonable prices. Request service today!
- All our services are guaranteed to provide you 100 % satisfaction.

Take Action To Protect Your Premises Today 

We're equipped to help you through our personalized pest control & prevention services. Contact SOS Extermination today. Get in touch now & obtain a free, no-obligation quote. We appreciate you for your recent visit to our site. We hope to see you soon!

profile:
Abat Extermination est une entreprise de gestion parasitaire certifiée AQGP qui sert sa clientèle dans plus de 40 villes autour de Québec, la capitale. Entreprise familiale établie depuis 1976,  les exterminateurs professionnels « d’Abat » ont su évoluer tant avec la législation québécoise qui régule le métier qu’avec l’apparition de nouveaux fléaux, comme les infestations de punaises de lit ou la recrudescence des fourmis charpentières.

Entre intervention éclair et réputation d’excellence, l’entreprise Abat Extermination effectue l’application des traitements nécessaires (de plus en plus écologiques) de façon sécuritaire quel que soit le type d’infestation auquel vous faites face.
name: Abat Extermination
